data.title: Ella Fitzgerald – Have Yourself a Merry Little Christmas (1960)
data.meta_description: Have Yourself a Merry Little Christmas is on the album Ella Wishes You a Swinging Christmas, a 1960 album by the American jazz  singer Ella Fitzgerald, recorded in the summer of 1960, with a studio orchestra arranged and conducted by Frank De Vol.                           [via Ronnie…
data.text:
Have Yourself a Merry Little Christmas is on the album Ella Wishes You a Swinging Christmas, a 1960 album by the American jazz singer Ella Fitzgerald, recorded in the summer of 1960, with a studio orchestra arranged and conducted by Frank De Vol. [source]

[via Ronnie Rocket, thanks a lot]
